TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapClientFormatterSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink
type SoapClientFormatterSink = class interface IClientFormatterSink interface IMessageSink interface IClientChannelSink interface IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 提供使用 的用戶端格式子 (Formatter) 接收的實作。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a client formatter sink that uses the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式器接收的功能是產生所需的標頭，並序列化訊息到資料流。The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream. 在達到格式器接收之後,會透過通道接收鏈結中的所有接收轉都送給或呼叫。After reaching the formatter sink, the is forwarded to all sinks in the channel sink chain through the or calls. 在這個階段已序列化訊息，並可作為資訊僅供參考。At this stage the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only. 需要建立或修改訊息的接收必須放在之前於格式子接收鏈結。Sinks that need to create or modify the message need to be placed in the sink chain before the formatter. 這可藉由實作兩者和介面。This can be achieved by implementing both the and interfaces. 格式器接收可以稍後放置到接收鏈結中。The formatter sink can be placed in the sink chain later. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式器是否將包含版本資訊。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值為`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此物件的執行個體，不受信任的資料，或透過不安全的通道會造成安全性風險。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 只能使用受信任的資料，並透過安全的通道，請使用此物件。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: Sinks and Sink Chains
